## Stats and Related Fields

#### Books

 - [Statistical Rethinking 2 with rstan and the tidyverse](https://solomon.quarto.pub/sr2rstan/) by Solomon Kurz
 - [Teaching Bayesian Statistics](http://talmo.uk/2024/teachingbayesian.html) by TALMO
 - [A Collection of Econometrics Resources](https://giuseppecavaliere.wixsite.com/giuseppe/econometrics-lecture-notes-and-books) by Giuseepe Cavaliere
 - [Applied Machine Learning for Tabular Data](https://aml4td.org/) by Max Kuhn and Kjell Johnson
 - [Statistical Tools for Causal Inference](https://chabefer.github.io/STCI/index.html) by Sylvain Chabe-Ferret
 - [Causal Inference: The Mixtape](https://mixtape.scunning.com/) by Scott Cunningham
 - [Applied Causal Inference Powered by ML and AI](https://causalml-book.org/) by Chernozhukov, Hansen, Kallus, Spindler, and Syrgkanis
 - [The Data Science Handbooks: Advice and Insights from 25 Amazing Data Scientists](https://www.thedatasciencehandbook.com/) by Shan, Wang, Chen, and Song

#### Notes

 - [Hierarchical Modeling](https://betanalpha.github.io/assets/case_studies/hierarchical_modeling.html) by Michael Betancourt
 - [Keep Calm and Learn Multilevel Logistic Modeling](https://rips-irsp.com/articles/10.5334/irsp.90#ill-show-you-a-three-step-simplified-procedure-for-multilevel-logistic-regression) by Nicolas Sommet and Davide Morselli
 - [Math-Stat Course Notes](https://people.stat.sc.edu/Tebbs/) by Joshua Tebbs
 - [Notes](https://www.adamnsmith.com/notes.html) by Adam N Smith
 - [Econometrics Notes](https://tbarmstr.github.io/teaching.html) by Tim Armstrong
